Description: Studio portrait of Egyptian family. Adult male sitting in front, holding large hookah [?], wearing shoes, trousers, tunic, turban. Three adult females, presumably wives, at rear with child and young child. Females wearing gowns, veil decorated with coins, metal note cylinders. Painted backdrop. Albumen print. Format: Mounted on card, second print on other side of card.
Curator's comments: Biography: Relationship of McCarthy to image is unclear.
